snippet: Ivory Coast has closed its land borders with Ebola-affected West African neighbours Guinea and Liberia in an attempt to prevent the world's deadliest outbreak of the virus from spreading to its territory, the government said....

headline.print_headline: Ivory Coast Shuts Borders With Liberia, Guinea Over Ebola Threat
headline.main: Ivory Coast Shuts Borders With Liberia, Guinea Over Ebola Threat

lead_paragraph: Ivory Coast has closed its land borders with Ebola-affected West African neighbours Guinea and Liberia in an attempt to prevent the world's deadliest outbreak of the virus from spreading to its territory, the government said.
